name: After the storm
description:
Hello guys

Thank you for checking out this page!

You can play the whole game in about 20 minutes to a hour or so!

You play as an detective who went to an island were there was a disaster, you need to find out what happend and who is responsible!

This whole game was created in a week (so don't expect to much ;) )

This was part of a challenge were I try to create one game a week!

You can watch the behind the scenes video here!

And the theme for this week was aftermath.

If you got any questions (also development related) feel free to ask me!
